title: Heera Ruby Jhumka - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Pearls. Traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These stunning Jhumkas feature an intricate flower design at the stud, adorned with Polki diamonds and a central ruby. The jhumka bells showcase beautifully carved rubies, framed by delicate Polki settings. Dangling ruby beads, interspersed with tiny pearls, create a graceful movement and adds a touch of traditional elegance, embodying the spirit of a South Indian temple jewellery aesthetic.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also
ideal for a formal celebration or party.
description: These Heera Ruby Jhumkas are a harmonious blend of tradition and modern design. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and hand-carved rubies ensures a luxurious and eye-catching piece. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees durability and enduring shine. The design is rooted in South Indian cultural heritage, adding significant value and creating a lasting legacy.
